review_data.title: Delicious food and nice people
review_data.content: The owners are so lovely here and both times I’ve been to Al Paso the food and coffee have been delicious! I would highly recommend the pastrami sandwich, although be warned it is huge. It is also in a very convenient location right near the...More

review_data.title: Good food and kindness
review_data.content: The owner was very kind to us, we had a nice chat and he offer us some soup and something to drink. The soup was very good and the pastrami sandwich was rich and well balanced.

review_data.title: Genial lecker und genial günstig

review_data.title: Great guys, product, atmosphere and location
review_data.content: Friendly people offering creative, fresh, healthy food served with enthusiasm. Sandwich, soup, coffee and amaretto were excellent. Nice decor. The place was packed with university students and people wanting something unique.

review_data.title: Super lecker
review_data.content: Es gibt super leckere Suppen und sehr feine Sandwiches. Das Mittagsangebot ist wirklich top für Fr. 12.-.

review_data.title: Klein aber fein!!
review_data.content: Alles frisch! Herrliche Salate, ausgetüftelte Sandwich-Kreationen und feinste Suppen! Aufgestelltes Team!

review_data.title: Best sandwiches in town!
review_data.content: Butifarra-Sandwich und Suppen vom Feinsten, bestes Pastrami ever - einfach superlecker! Streuselkuchen unbedingt probieren!!!
